/*
This program runs the regressions and tables presented in "Credit Chains and Sectoral Comovement"
Claudio Raddatz, The World Bank, 2010
*/
/*Defines extensions for the files' names: Tables will be saved with the name in the paper plus this extension*/
/*Bangladesh is an outlier, this flag determines whether to include it in the sample*/
/*LKA outlier in IIP regressions. Elimination is not crucial.*/
*Defining industries with high and low distance for future reference
*For regressions with the Payables turnover measure go to the 12-28-07 version of the program

varlist.value: "Credit Chain Linkage (Short term debt to Payables)"
"Generic Credit Chain Linkage X (log) GDP per capita"
"Generic Credit Chain Linkage X Growth Volatility"
"Generic Credit Chain Linkage X Trade Openness"
"Dist. capital per employee X Capital per Worker"
"Generic Credit Chain Linkage X Stock Market Cap."

value: //Renaming variables for presentation in vertical mode

varlist.value: "Dist. Gini intermediary shares X Overall Volatility"
"Generic Credit Chain Dist. X Overall Volatility"
"Credit Chain Linkage X Short term debt to Payables"
"IO Backward linkages matrix X Payables Financing"
